title: 320+ Stylized Inventory Icons
description: Over 320 icons perfectly fitted for inventory. You can find such icons as food, elixirs, keys, resources, tools, crystals, jewellery, gems and more. If you like this package check Inventory Icons + Low Poly Meshes Bundle! Link below.
longDescription:
Inventory Icons


Over 320 2D icons perfectly fitted for fantasy inventory. You can find such icons as various food, elixirs(bottles), keys, resources, tools, crystals, jewellery, gems and more. 

If you like this package you can check this Inventory Icons + Meshes Bundle! Click here: Fantasy Inventory Low Poly Props + Icons Bundle




Full list of icons:


 - 20 shapes of bottles (every shape is in 5 colors - red, blue, green, yellow, purple)

 - 4 shapes of crystal (3 shape of individual crystal and one cluster) each in 8 colors (blue, green, magenta, pink, red, violet, purple, yellow)

 - food items: red apple, green apple, bread, buns in two different colors, carafe, carrot, cheese in 3 shapes, cherries, corn, cucumber, egg, fish, garlic, meat, mushrooms in 4 different shapes, peach, pear in two different colors, pie in two shapes, empty plate, meal, potato, pumpkin, sausage, tomato, bottle of wine in two shapes.

 - 156 icons of various inventory items: anvil, bag in 2 different colors, bars (bronze, silver, gold), bell, binoculars, bomb, bone, 14 books (4 types of shapes: 3 books closed with ornaments and 4 books closed without ornaments, 3 open books, 4 pile of books in various colors), empty bowl, branch, broom, 7 shapes of candles, coal, 2 shapes of coin, pile of coins, coins pouch, compass, 4 colors of cord (blue, green, red, yellow), crown ( in 3 colors bronze, gold, silver), drinking horn, drum, 3 envelopes (green, blue and red ornament), flute, 6 shapes of gems in 3 colors (blue, red, green - 18 variants in total), glasses, glass jar, 3 shapes of goblets in 3 colors (gold, bronze, silver - 9 variants in total), hammer, horseshoe, hourglass, inkbottle, 4 shapes of keys in 3 colors (bronze, gold, silver - 12 variants in total), knife, lantern, log, magnifier, map, mortar, wooden mug, 2 shapes of mugs (silver, bronze), nail, olive bottle, pan, paper, 8 pedants in various colors, 9 ring in various colors (with and without gems), pickaxe, plank in 2 shapes, pot, quill, rock, 3 shapes of rope, 3 shapes of runes, sachet, scrolls in 3 colors (blue, green, red), shell closed and open, shovel, sickle, sleeping bag, soup, spoon, tool, torch in 2 shapes, toy and waterskin.
